preference.name: ArchitectureModeler_use_all_installation_assemblies
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the system stops at the first installation assembly found, or continues walking up the tree, searching for additional installation assemblies. Valid Values: TRUE - System continues searching for additional installation assemblies. FALSE - System does not continue searching for additional installation assemblies.
